statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={5.2}, \displaystyle{b}={8.1}, \displaystyle{c}={9.4}, and \displaystyle{d}={12.9} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={104}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
